title: Execution Component
description: Versatile execution component with customizable start positions, motion warping, and ragdoll on death. Includes 4 free animations, character state checks, and reset options for enhanced gameplay flexibility.
longDescription:
The Execution Component is a versatile and powerful tool designed to enhance the immersive experience in your game by providing multiple execution options and animations. This component is perfect for developers looking to integrate detailed and customizable execution mechanics into their projects. Here's what you can expect:


Use Cases

The Execution Component is ideal for a wide range of game genres, including:

  • Action/Adventure: Enhance combat mechanics with dynamic and satisfying executions.
  • Stealth: Implement stealth kills that reward careful planning and positioning.
  • RPGs: Add dramatic and cinematic flair to battles, making each encounter memorable.

Integration

Integrating the Execution Component into your project is straightforward. Detailed documentation and support are provided to guide you through the setup process, ensuring you can take full advantage of all the features offered.

Why Choose Our Execution Component?

  • Flexibility: Fully customizable to fit the specific needs of your game.
  • Realism: Advanced motion warping and ragdoll effects provide a realistic and immersive experience.
  • Ease of Use: Clear documentation and included animations make implementation quick and hassle-free.
  • Support: Our team is dedicated to providing excellent support and regular updates.
technicalDetails:
Showcase | Tutorial

Features:

  1. Customizable Execution Options:
  • Front & Back Executions: Perform executions from both the front and back of the character, adding variety and strategic depth to your gameplay.
  • Execution Start Position Alignment: Easily customize the alignment of execution start positions to fit your gameâ€™s unique needs, ensuring seamless integration.
  1. Advanced Motion Warping:
  • Utilize motion warping technology to dynamically adjust character movements during executions, providing a smooth and realistic experience.
  1. Realistic Ragdoll on Death:
  • Characters transition to a ragdoll state upon death, enhancing the realism and visual impact of executions.
  1. Enhanced Gameplay Flexibility:
  • Character State Checks: Ensure that executions only occur under appropriate conditions with comprehensive character state checks.
  • Reset Options: Easily reset characters to their pre-execution states, providing flexibility in gameplay and development.
  1. Included Animations:
  • Four high-quality, free execution animations are included, allowing you to implement and test execution mechanics in your game quickly.

Network Replicated: (No)

Windows: (Yes)

Plugins Used: Motion Warping
